attributes.title: OH HELL NAHH !
attributes.review: I opening the app for 1 second and i see sexual anime characters dancing on my screen , i dont know if this is a glitch or what but this app needs to be deleted 😭. I dont need to see naked anime characters dancing on my screen , donald trump might like it but not on my watch !

attributes.title: Wow!?!
attributes.review:
Wow, I love trump however, this app is a failure of computing leadership. It seems like there is a nasty bug that is making it so I can’t access the really important info Donald puts out. I am so angry and this might make me vote for Biden. 

He can’t even manage his own app.

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♂️✨You tried, never try again✨🧚🏻‍♂️💋
attributes.review: To see a homophobic, racist pig running for office makes my physically sick. You say liberty and justice for all but you really mean liberty and justice for whites. You oppress people of different race and sexual preference then expect the nation to stand by you.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app kept making my phone crash and honestly did not point me in any helpful direction to support the Cheeto man. I’m really disappointed in this app and am looking for some change. Thank you.

attributes.title: July Review
attributes.review: I can’t believe this app! It is so slow to load and it won’t send me any notifications! It literally feels so slow that I can even eat an entire meal before this app even loads! So frustrating!

attributes.title: 😉tiktok
attributes.review: This app is the worst it kept glitching and messing up every 5 seconds. For me it kept showing ads I don’t know about other people but I was really stressed out😭 like how am I supposed to check up on my favorite Cheeto 😭

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app. Right after opening the app, my phone blacked out and shut off. I turned it back on and it played a high pitches noise, driving my poor dog insane. This app is horrible 0/10 goodbye.

attributes.title: Eh
attributes.review:
I don’t know why it thought this app would be something as great as Trump.

I thought this would have like little bits of him saying lock her up, or saying we should keep statues up. 

Very disappointed in its performance.

attributes.title: Disgusting ✨
attributes.review: It took approximately 4 hours to download and once it did it crashed my phone, I couldn’t lock or unlock it for a couple hours as well, worst app ever tbh. I finally got it deleted but this app it complete crap

attributes.title: Couldn’t believe it.
attributes.review: This app really messed with the wrong person. I am so fed up. Freezes, closes out and hardly ever opens. It’s almost like my rights are being taken away because I cannot support my lord and savior Cheesus Trump.
